title: Kicking it Super Hard with Mario Strikers: Battle League
description:
You know Mario, from Mario? He's so much more than a jumping plumber, you know. He's doing soccer now, too. I mean, he's been doing soccer, and a lot of other stuff, and we're going to be talking about ALL that while we share some thoughts about Mario Strikers: Battle League. 

Games discussed: No Man's Sky, Rogue Legacy 2, Path of Exile, Fortnite, Vampire Survivor, Yakuza 0
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Griffin McElroy, Chris Plante, Russ Frushtick)
